text: Pavish Narayan (born 2003) is an Indian actor and Assistant Director, known for his work in Tamil cinema. ==Overview== Pavish Narayan's mother is Vimala Geetha (Dhanush's sister) and thus is the nephew of actor Dhanush. He acted his first movie in Vaathi as a student and debuting his role as Prabhu in Nilavuku En Mel Ennadi Kobam. ==Other websites== * Pavish Narayan's Instagram ==References== ==Notes== Category:2003 births Category:Indian actors Category:Living people
title: Pavish Narayan
